sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAIΑΝΙΑ , in botany : A genus of the hexandria order, belonging to the dioecia claſs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking under the nth order, Sa-mentaceœ. The male calyx is fexpartite ; there is no corolla. The female calyx as in the male, without any corolla; there are three ſtyles; the fruit is roundiſh with ari oblique wing, inferior. There are three ſpecies, the haſtata, cordata, and quinquefolia.
